topic.title: RENAL VEIN TUMOUR THROMBUS INDICATION CODE FOR UROLOGICAL
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether there is evidence of Tumour thrombus (a rare complication of many solid cancers) in the renal vein and if so the type during an Urological Cancer Care Spell.
